summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingClinique Beyond Perfecting Foundation + Concealer makeup is a foundation-and-concealer in one for a natural look that lasts 24 hours.
details: DetailsBenefitsSkin Types: Dry Combination, Combination Oily, Oily.Coverage: Full.Finish: Natural.Lightweight, moisturizing foundation and concealer makeup covers thoroughly without clogging pores.Skin breathes comfortably, color stays true, even through sweat and humidity.Due to the rich pigment level that enhances this flawless-coverage makeup, shades may appear deeper when first applied.Once blended completely and allowed to dry, Beyond Perfecting Makeup will melt into your skin for a Beyond Perfected flawless look. A little goes a long way.Dermatologist and ophthalmologist tested.Safe for contact lens wearers.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilFragranceItem 2282753How To UseUsing the large backside of the wand, sweep foundation across your forehead, cheeks, and chin. Then use the angled tip of the applicator - that has a slight dip in it to hold more product - to cover down the bridge of the nose and across the jawline. Blend well with fingers. Finish by using the pointy tip to spot conceal any trouble areas-under the eyes, around the outside of the nose, on top of blemishes. Pat and blend well with fingers.Tip: Due to the rich pigment level that enhances this flawless coverage makeup, shades may appear deeper when first applied. Once blended completely and allowed to dry, Beyond Perfecting Makeup will melt into your skin for a Beyond Perfected flawless look. A little goes a long way! Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup RemoverIngredientsWater / Aqua / Eau, Isostearyl Neopentanoate, Dimethicone, Isohexadecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Lauryl PEG-9 Polydimethylsiloxyethyl Dimethicone, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Trehalose, PEG-10 Dimethicone, HDI / Trimethylol Hexyllactone Crosspolymer, Dimethicone / PEG-10 / 15 Crosspolymer, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hydrolyzed Soy Protein, Tocopheryl Acetate, Polymethyl Methacrylate, Propylene Carbonate, Lecithin, Laureth-7, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Dimethicone Silylate, Xanthan Gum, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Chloride, Magnesium Aluminum Silicate, Polyaminopropyl Biguanide, Silica, Coconut Acid, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol. May Contain: Mica, Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Iron Oxides (CI 77492), Iron Oxides (CI 77499), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Zinc Oxide (CI 77947), Bismuth Oxychloride (CI 77163).Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Using the large backside of the wand, sweep foundation across your forehead, cheeks, and chin. Then use the angled tip of the applicator - that has a slight dip in it to hold more product - to cover down the bridge of the nose and across the jawline. Blend well with fingers. Finish by using the pointy tip to spot conceal any trouble areas-under the eyes, around the outside of the nose, on top of blemishes. Pat and blend well with fingers.Tip: Due to the rich pigment level that enhances this flawless coverage makeup, shades may appear deeper when first applied. Once blended completely and allowed to dry, Beyond Perfecting Makeup will melt into your skin for a Beyond Perfected flawless look. A little goes a long way! Remove with Clinique Take The Day Off Cleansing Balm Makeup Remover

reviews.headline: My favorite foundation!
reviews.comments: Love this foundation. Looks best on my skin of all the others I've tried. Doesn't make me look cakey.

reviews.headline: I like the product it works for me .
reviews.comments: The only thing that the foundation i recieved smelled old

reviews.headline: I used this for 7 years
reviews.comments: I used this product for 7 years. My skin has changed throughout the years. I used to have combo skin and now I have oily skin. I have always had dehydrated looking skin. This product has great coverage and it is the only foundation I found at the time of initial purchase. That was my exact color match being pale with neutral undertones it was hard to find a foundation that wasn't yellow or pink entirely For the color selection. I would say it gets a 10 out of 10 however I will say that since my initial purchase, I was always under the impression that this was a dewy finish. I was extremely surprised to find out after purchasing it a couple times that it is actually supposed to be a soft matte finish. It absolutely is not a soft matte finish. This is an extremely greasy or dewy finish. For me that was not a problem as I don't like looking extremely matte. When my skin was combo, I would find that I could set this foundation a lot better with powder however I would still have breakthrough oils. After only maybe two or three hours it would make for mainly an all day where but I could absolutely not touch my face as it would transfer Since becoming more oily. I had a hard time letting go of this product just because of the color match, but it became a nuisance when I couldn't touch my face at all, and it started to feel really heavy on my face‚Ä¶ powder wouldn't really set it, and I would feel like it would just make it feel thicker on my Face And powder would actually make it break apart even more. Ultimately, I recently made the switch to a different product as I know that a lot of other lines are more inclusive with their shades now so I did find a color match and another brand the applicator on this as well I think contributed to my acne since you do have have to touch it to a surface and it is not a pump. Additionally, there is a piece in the cap attached to the applicator that comes off and gets stuck inside the bottle and this has happened for years. It's easy enough to remove or put back in place but it is something I've come to expect with this foundation I don't see myself going back to this foundation after trying different brands, but I think it's worth it to say that I was loyal to it for a long time and maybe if you have dry skin this would be the perfect foundation for you.

reviews.headline: I highly recommend this
reviews.comments: Very good and helpful with my daughter facial skin issues and matches and covers the spots very well. The store consultant helped us choose the best color and product for my daughter skin since she never tried anything before. Excellent product and good for her skin tone.

reviews.headline: I would never purchase this product again
reviews.comments:
I will say that this product does give full coverage, however, it most certainly does not stay in place AT ALL.  I have acne prone skin, so I was looking for something with full coverage that was non comedogenic.  Previously, I was using Estee Laudre Double Wear.  Just wanted to try something different.  
I couldn't believe how the makeup transferred with just the slightest touch.  It also felt very heavy and just felt like it sat on my face.  
I ended up going back to Estee Laudre Doudle Wear.

reviews.headline: The coverage is absolutely beautiful.
reviews.comments: The product is a good combination of coverage, beauty, and moisture. I'm a bit concerned that the tester used in the store came out easily and abundantly, but the bottle she sold me does not come out as abundantly. Is there a remedy?

reviews.headline: Colors Are Much Darker Than Described
reviews.comments: I love the product, but last time I got it, I chose a color that was a shade too dark. So I went down to Cool Chamois, described as "very fair." It's even darker than my last one, and it's very pink! So I will use it by blending with a lighter foundation, I love the coverage, but the colors are completely messed up. Buy only in person after testing.

reviews.headline: Horrible
reviews.comments: I've tried to give this foundation a try but it just didn't work well for me. I've tried numerous applications and blending techniques and it matter which technique I used it still left streaks or blothes. I use a blurring lines and primer and the foundation still would settle in my pores and didn't give a smooth finish. I came off easily even with a setting powder. Touch on the nose or cheek or jawline and I would have to touch up or reapply in that area. I have used Clinique foundations before trying this one and didn't have a problem. Clinique seems to be phasing out the previous foundation I have used and adding more foundations with sunscreen (which I can't use) in them.

reviews.headline: Messy
reviews.comments: This concealer works well and is not a bad product, however after a few weeks of use, the container becomes a leakey mess. I will not be buying it again.

reviews.headline: Great Product
reviews.comments: I love the color and the sells person match me up with the right one.

reviews.headline: Would buy again
reviews.comments: It covers well ..especially brown spots ..I really like this beyond perfecting foundation and concealer!

reviews.headline: Nice product but not for me
reviews.comments: I returned this because the coverage was way to thick for me. I don't like wearing foundation (bought this thinking it was just concealer haha) but if I did, this would be a good option for me. It just felt too heavy for my preference but this is probably because I only wear tined sunscreen and concealer. I wore it a few times before returning it thinking I could get used to the way it felt but it just isn't for me. It covered my Melasma patches and dark circles though! Probably better for those who want a full coverage foundation. Didn't give it 5 stars because I didn't use it enough to really see if I had any other issues with it. It seemed to last long but did look somewhat heavy, probably because I'm just not used to wearing that much makeup.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again.
reviews.comments: Excellent Coverage.  Would like for the foundation to come out of the bottle easier.

reviews.headline: One of my favorites
reviews.comments: I love to use this as a fast foundation application, or for the low makeup days and just dot it in the red areas and blend out with a dense brush. I don't suggest using a damp sponge for this! I use a brush and it goes on very smooth. You can use it sparingly in just spots on your face like concealer (like i do) or put more on your face for a high coverage look. I recommend setting this lightly tho it can be slightly thick an tacky.

reviews.headline: Great coverage
reviews.comments: This foundation/concealer in one works great to balance the skin pigments to one smooth finished look.

reviews.headline: unsure..
reviews.comments: used this product forever, but I think the formula is different because it creases under my eyes sooo bad. ive tried applying extra and tried different setting powders with it, but it just isnt as good as it used to be.

reviews.headline: Love This
reviews.comments: I work ten hours four days a week and this lasts. I do suggest putting moisturizer on before applying though because if you don't it will crease. Might just be because I'm older and have really dry skin. Anyway, this is great. A little goes a ling way, it lasts all day, stays on better than most brands, and has a wonderful healthy underglow to it that makes me feel a bit younger when I look in the mirror.

reviews.headline: Been using this foundation for for almost 10 years!!!!
reviews.comments: Has been my favorit for almost 10 years now.

reviews.headline: Far from perfect
reviews.comments: The color match on alabaster as a neutral ran pink, the applicator is hard to use, came off cakey and broke apart, the coverage was great and applied well but it doesn't work as much of a benefit when it settles into creases

reviews.headline: I love the foundation - will continue to purchase
reviews.comments: Love it - great foundation - great coverage

media.headline: I would buy this product again
media.caption: Picture Perfect

faceoff_positive.comments: I purchased Golden Neutral, and at first I thought it seemed very dark. I put a puddle on my hand and then applied with a sponge. That's not the way to do it with this foundation. The applicator in the bottle can be used to dab on hands or face, and then this can be blended with a sponge or fingers. A dot of it does wonders. My regular amount of foundation is way, way too much. After a couple of days of playing around with this, I realize I need less to cover my whole face than I ever could have imagined. This is, by far, the most highly concentrated foundation I've ever used. I tend to go for "sheer" foundations that can be built up to medium coverage, so I'm not used to such a tiny amount having such true coverage. Beyond Perfecting is something I "dot" on my face...1-2 dots does my WHOLE face. It is a fabulous concealer for spots, discolorations, redness, and large pores. It takes a couple of minutes to "set", and it looks pretty heavy at first. However, I notice when it sets it seems to disappear, and my skin looks flawless. Golden Neutral is actually the perfect color for me once this adjusts itself and sets. I really enjoy the super light, silky feel of this and I love the matte, extremely long-lasting finish. This may just top Superbalanced as my favorite foundation, and that's saying a lot! I really like Beyond Perfecting's large concealer wand for application. Other serum foundations with droppers are such a mess. This stays neat and clean and it makes application a breeze. The texture of this is unique...there's nothing else like it. Great buy! I am so glad Clinique makes fragrance-free products for sensitive skin. They keep me feeling pretty.
faceoff_positive.headline: A little practice and it's perfect

faceoff_negative.comments: I was very excited about this foundation when told to me by my regular SA late last year. When another makeup store offered it early, I jumped at the chance to try it. Knowing that some foundations are not consistent in the color due to formulation, I ordered two that I believed to be closest to - Amber and Golden. In most Clinique foundations, I am matched to Amber since Spice is only offered in the Stay Matte (I am more neutral in my undertones) but they tend to be just a shade dark so I tried the Amber in this one first. The color intensity was right but very, very orange. That was just in one swipe and so orange I did not bother to complete a full face and was discouraged to try the other shade. A few days later, I tried the Golden, much better but just too light and it is very obvious. I did complete a full face and felt that the foundation was weightless and it did have a mattifying finish to it, almost flat-like where you would have to add blush, highlighting or whatever to add definition back to your face. Therefore, I would not call it skin-like like some of the newer foundations on the marketing are advertising and would not recommend for a quick 5-minute face. I even went in store for a SA to color match and again, the match was not to be found. I would recommend the foundation for those who can find their color match and like a medium to full coverage and don't mind the extra time to add definition to your face with contouring, etc.
faceoff_negative.headline: Nice But Not Quite There Yet
